title: New: The Neighbourhood – Let It Go
body:
Having just finished their debut UK jaunt, Californian hip-pop outfit **The Neighbourhood** are set to release their next single, _Let It Go_ via Columbia records.

Continuing with the same slick, almost too-cool vibe found on their debut EP I’m Sorry, it’s a mixture of ready made pophits with the R’n’B swagger that the likes of **The Weeknd** and **Lana Del Rey** have captured. Check out _Let It Go_ below. Big choruses, bigger ambitions.
